item.description:
We are meeting for dinner at the Cambridge Courtside where we will discuss our 2013 agenda. 2013 features our most ambitious schedule to date and we are recruiting committees and committee heads to handle what will be some of New England's best events. Come on down and participate in the direction and management of some huge Boston and beyond happenings. This years successful committee people would be eligible to be nominated for 2014 Board positions. Dinner is on us so come on down and see what we bring to the community in 2013.  We are the Loaves & Fishes Meal Program, Boston Charity Work.

 

 

The Boston Volunteers

Big enough to deliver, small enough to care

Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Ever Wanted to Be on a Charity Committee or Board
